profile.name: PAL 1080 50i
profile.args: f=mpegts vcodec=mpeg2video s=1440x1080 b=19700k ab=384000 g=12 ildct=1 ilme=1 profile=hdv_1080_50i

profile.name: PAL 720 25p
profile.args: f=mpegts vcodec=mpeg2video s=1280x720 b=19700k ab=384000 g=12 profile=hdv_720_25p

profile.name: NTSC 720 30p
profile.args: f=mpegts vcodec=mpeg2video s=1280x720 b=19700k ab=384000 g=15 profile=hdv_720_30p
